snippet.title: Eskimo Eddie - Commodore 64 Gameplay (Steam re-release)
snippet.description:
Originally released in 1984 for home microcomputers, this arcade-style game from the legendary Ocean Software saw players take on the role of Eddie and his friend Percy Penguin.

Rescue Percy Penguin from the clutches of the fearsome polar bear Growler (in this first level the gameplay differs in the two versions of the game - the ZX Spectrum version has you dodging ice holes and polar bears that criss cross the screen, the Commodore 64 version has you jumping over snowballs as you climb up the level towards your goal). Then, Percy must defend himself against deadly Snowbugs, pushing sliding ice blocks for protection.

The gameplay is from the Steam re-release by Pixel Games UK, which also includes the ZX Spectrum version.

Developed by Ocean Software
Steam re-release by Pixel Games UK
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2254060/Eskimo_Eddie_C64Spectrum/

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #retrogames #retrogaming #commodore64 #c64 #commodore #pixelgamesuk #c64games #commodore64games #oceansoftware #ocean #pixelgamesuk
